fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.interfaces

Interface ImageManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageManagerImpl

    public interface ImageManager
    Interface used for implementing image manager class.

    This interface defines all the specific methods that must be implemented to manage images on items. Methods present in the interface implementation are allowed to use as many as data access objects required to accomplish their goal. The access of one of data access object method by the controllers is strictly forbidden. There is no method to retrieve images because they are contained in the item itself. Retrieving an item allow then access to its images.

    See Also:
    add(Item, String), delete(Image)

    • Method Detail

      • setManagerFactory

        void setManagerFactory(ManagerFactory managerFactory)
        Set the manager factory.

        This method retrieves the manager factory to allow the instance methods to access others managers.

        Parameters:
        managerFactory - Manager factory instance.

      • add

        Image add(Item item,
          java.lang.String path)
   throws ModelException
        Create an item image.

        This method create an image into the persistence unit and attach it to the item supplied in parameter. This method doesn't care about how the image file is retrieved and how it is saved in the system storage.

        Parameters:
        item - Item that the new image belongs to.
        path - Path to the image file.
        Returns:
        The newly created image.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.

      • delete

        void delete(@NotNull
            @NotNull Image image)
     throws ModelException
        Delete an image.

        This method delete an image from the persistence unit and remove it from the item.

        Parameters:
        image - Image to delete.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.
